Package org.eclipse.mosaic.lib.routing

Interface VehicleRouting

All Known Implementing Classes:
DatabaseRouting, NoRouting
public interface VehicleRouting
Interface providing a vehicle routing API for applications.

    • createRouteForRTI

      VehicleRoute createRouteForRTI(CandidateRoute candidateRoute) throws IllegalRouteException

      Returns:
      simplified version of the route
      Throws:
      IllegalRouteException

    • getRoutesFromDatabaseForMessage

    • refineRoute

      VehicleRoute refineRoute(VehicleRoute route)
      This method completes a route definition if it is missing either a list of node ids or connection ids, but provides the other.
      Parameters:
      route - the potentially incomplete VehicleRoute
      Returns:
      the completed VehicleRoute with list of node ids and connection ids
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the route contains neither node ids nor connection ids

    • approximateCostsForCandidateRoute

      CandidateRoute approximateCostsForCandidateRoute(CandidateRoute route, String lastNodeId)
      Approximates the costs of a CandidateRoute. Pass a CandidateRoute and the ID of the last Node the vehicle passed on to the method and it will return a new Candidate route with the approximated values in its "length" and "time" field. The method approximates by calculating distance and time between the candidate route's first intersection and last intersection. The calculation will be done on the fly and might thus have impact on overall performance of a simulation.
      Parameters:
      route - CandidateRoute to be cost-approximated
      lastNodeId - ID of last passed node
      Returns:
      a new CandidateRoute

    • findClosestRoadPosition

      IRoadPosition findClosestRoadPosition(GeoPoint point)
      Searches for the closest road position to a given GeoPoint.
      Parameters:
      point - The closest road position to the given location.
      Returns:
      The closest road position as IRoadPosition.

    • findClosestRoadPosition

      IRoadPosition findClosestRoadPosition(GeoPoint point, double heading)
      Searches for the closest road position to a given GeoPoint, If two adjacent edges overlap, the heading will be used as a similarity measure.
      Parameters:
      point - The closest road position to the given location.
      heading - used as a measure of similarity if multiple edges match
      Returns:
      The closest road position as IRoadPosition.

    • findClosestNode

      Parameters:
      point - The closest node to the given location.
      Returns:
      The closest node as INode.
